toolbox_instructions_widget_instruction_: Tab the toolbox to access your tools
custom_about_dialog_text_1: Toolbox is a collection of useful tools that are a must-have on every smartphone. Instead of loads of different small apps I have bundeled them into one super-app, making it a digital swiss army knife!
custom_about_dialog_text_2: If you like my work, please consider buying me a coffee.
calibration_explanation_text_mm: Measure 5 centimeters & tab the save button to calibrate. Drag the edge of the colored box to resize the ruler.
calibration_explanation_text_inch: Measure 2 inches & tab the save button to calibrate. Drag the edge of the colored box to resize the ruler.
no_compass_text: This device does not have a compass...
location_needed_text: We need your location for the compass to display correctly
no_qr_text: Enter a link and tap the button to generate a QR-Code.
qr_result_trailing_text_wifi: . Location barcodes are not yet supported by this app...
qr_result_trailing_text_location: . Location barcodes are not yet supported by this app...
qr_result_trailing_text_email: Email barcodes are not yet supported by this app...
qr_result_trailing_text_sms: Sms barcodes are not yet supported by this app...
qr_result_trailing_text_calendar: Calendar event barcodes are not yet supported by this app...
qr_result_trailing_text_phone: Phone barcodes are not yet supported by this app...
qr_result_trailing_text_licence: Driver license barcodes are not yet supported by this app...
qr_result_text_not_supported: The scanned barcode type is not supported by this app...
ar_ruler_info_dialog_content:
Wait for the virtual plane to appear. Then tap that plane to place a virtual measurement point in the room. 

Measuring outside the detected plane is not possible. 

If no plane appears, move the phone around or consider to add more light in the room.
